question: Which Bollywood film has won the best film honour at the 2017 Hong Kong International Film Festival?
explanation: Bollywood film \"Newton\" has won the best film honour at the Hong Kong International Film Festival.  Amit Masurkar-directed \"Newton\", which also stars Anjali Patil and RajKumar Rao, is a political satire. It had its world premiere at the 67th Berlin Film Festival where it won the International Federation of Art Cinemas (CICAE) award in its Forum segment.
